RemoteInterfaces

Interface ServantInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Servant

    public interface ServantInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Single remote interface to be implemented by the servant. Defines all the methods a remote client can invoke/request to the server This interface contains methods related to several subjects, it contains methods for manage the registered users, for create offers of product and manage bids performed to those offers. It also defines methods for the client to subscribe, unsubscribe and perform the required dispersion of data when the attribute of client's interest changes (in a more general way, these last 3 methods should be defined in a separated interface called Subject to finish the complete concept of the Observer Design Pattern and be implemented by the servant, but they were left in the same interface for this not to confront against what was learned in DS class

     throws java.rmi.RemoteException

      • registerUser

        boolean registerUser(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String nickname,
                     java.lang.String email,
                     java.lang.String address,
                     java.lang.String phone)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Register a new user with this data
        Parameters:
        name - real name of the new user [required]
        nickname - nickname of the new user (must be unique) [required]
        email - email address of the new uer [optional]
        address - physical address of the new user [optional]
        phone - phone number of the new user [optional]
        Returns:
        true if the user was correctly registered, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • seekUser

        User seekUser(java.lang.String nickname)
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Search for an user with a determined nickname
        Parameters:
        nickname - the nickname of the user to be searched
        Returns:
        a copy of the User object associated with that nickname or null if no user has that nickname
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • addOffer

        void addOffer(java.lang.String nickname,
              java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String description,
              double initialPrice,
              java.time.LocalDate deadline)
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Place a new offer with this data
        Parameters:
        nickname - nickname of the user who's placing the offer
        name - name of the product to be offered
        description - brief description of the product
        initialPrice - price to be used as lower threshold for the consequent bids
        deadline - date when the auction will be counted as expired or finished
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • newBid

        void newBid(int offerID,
            java.lang.String bidder,
            double bid)
     throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Perform a new bid over the indicated offer
        Parameters:
        offerID - ID of the offer that the user wants to bid over
        bidder - nickname of the client who's planting the bid
        bid - amount of money greater than the current highest bid for that offer
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getCurrentOffers

        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Integer,Offer> getCurrentOffers()
                                                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Request an updated version of the offers collection
        Returns:
        a copy of the server's collection of all the offers placed so far
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
